itemDescription: British member of the Indian Civil Service and Liberal Party politician

wikipedia_page.main: Sir Henry John Stedman Cotton,  (13 September 1845 – 22 October 1915) had a long career in the Indian Civil Service, during which he was sympathetic to Indian nationalism.  After returning to England, he served as a Liberal Party Member of Parliament (MP) for Nottingham East from 1906 to January 1910.
